divs: Sighting DetailsI had an experience that took me out of body, not a sighting. Just before I went inside to go to bed I was looking at the stars, it was a clear night and the sky was full of stars. I started to concentrate on a small star overhead then I went to bed. Lying there I still was thinking obout this star. Somthing began to happen, I started to loose feeling in my entire body and it felt relaxing. After about a half an hour I found myself awake and inside somthing that had a checked floor that was glowing and there was a semi sphirical with rabbit ear antenna. I thought I was dreaming so I moved forward toward it and it came at me I then became startaled and tried to wake up but I could not. I started to fight to wake up and it was though I was paralized and the my bed felt as though it was spinning. I finnaly was back in my body. I have neve told anyone about this until now nor have I ever had such an expierince since. I don't mess with things I don't understand any more. This was not a dream I had no body but I could move at will. Thank you and you can take this story for what it is worth and you can belive it or not but I know what happened.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Helena
There were no other sightings in Helena on or around November 20th 1968
